prompts: Create a mischievous-looking Pokemon that can release stinky gases to confuse opponents.
Show me a dark-type Pokemon with a sleek design and vibrant purple fur.
Imagine a playful creature that thrives in urban environments and loves to scavenge.
Generate a unique Pokemon with sharp claws and a long, pointed tail for agility.
Design a Pokemon that uses its smell as a strategy in battles against stronger foes.
Give me a dark and poison-type Pokemon that has a dual color scheme of purple and cream.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a trickster with a playful demeanor.
